SIX PLOTS FOR SALE ONLY 2 REMAINING
03
Project
A secluded and private 6-acre estate bordering the Kanneliya Forest. 30 minutes from the City of Galle, in the Southern Province of Sri Lanka. Each plot is perched atop a rocky rim with 20-kilometer views in front

SIX PLOTS FOR SALE
ONLY 2 REMAINING

A secluded and private 6-acre estate bordering the Kanneliya Forest.
30 minutes from the City of Galle, in the Southern Province of Sri Lanka.
Each plot is perched atop a rocky rim with 20-kilometer views in front

Scroll to Explore

SIX PLOTS FOR SALE
ONLY 2 REMAINING

A secluded and private 6-acre estate bordering the
Kanneliya Forest. 30 minutes from the City of Galle,
in the Southern Province of Sri Lanka. Each plot is
perched atop a rocky rim with 20-kilometer views in front

Scroll to Explore

These 1-acre sites offers
a tranquil and authentic
life immersed in nature

With the heritage forest reserve in the back
and blessed with a free-flowing stream to the right,
this property is a hidden gem for nature lovers.

Anyone purchasing this beautiful property
can collaborate and design their home with Shakticola,
an architectural and design firm based in Galle .

shakticola.com

These 1-acre sites offers a tranquil
and authentic life immersed in nature.

With the heritage forest reserve in the back and blessed with a free-flowing
stream to the right, this property is a hidden gem for nature lovers. Anyone
purchasing this beautiful property can collaborate and design their home with
Shakticola, an architectural and design firm based in Galle .

Phoenix Residence
Under construction

With a completion date of November, 2022,
this private contemporary home showcases floor
to ceiling glass doors and windows and comes
with a generous outdoor deck which spills right
into a seamless eternity pool.

Designed and project managed by Shakticola.
